page.title: 19HIGH HILL FARM,HAYFIELD.
page.content: On our farm we have mainly sheep and beef cattle.We have 65 ewes for breeding.We have three different breeds,Welsh half-breds,Gritstones and Swales.We have 98 lambs which are Teeswater and Suffolks.The ewes are between 2 and 5 years old and would cost about Â£45 each.The lambs would cost about Â£35 each.We have six heifers which fatten up over Summer.We have forty nine and a half acres of grassland which we graze.The farm house was built at the turn of the century and is on Hayfield Road.When we go on holiday we have to get someone to look after everything for us.The day begins at about six-thirty a.m.and ends about seven o'clock p.m.although this can be earlier or later at lambing time.The busiest time of the year is between April and June.
